001package com.telos.loops.contacts;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnoreProperties;
004import jakarta.annotation.Nonnull;
005import java.util.Map;
006
007/**
008 * Request to create a new contact in Loops.
009 *
010 * <p>At minimum, you must provide an email address. All other fields are optional. Custom
011 * properties can be included via the additionalProperties map.
012 *
013 * <p>Example usage:
014 *
015 * <pre>{@code
016 * ContactCreateRequest request = new ContactCreateRequest(
017 *     "user@example.com",  // email (required)
018 *     "John",              // firstName
019 *     "Doe",               // lastName
020 *     true,                // subscribed
021 *     "premium",           // userGroup
022 *     "user123",           // userId
023 *     Map.of("newsletter", true),  // mailingLists
024 *     Map.of("planName", "Pro")    // additionalProperties
025 * );
026 * }</pre>
027 *
028 * @param email the contact's email address (required)
029 * @param firstName the contact's first name
030 * @param lastName the contact's last name
031 * @param subscribed whether the contact should be subscribed (defaults to true)
032 * @param userGroup the user group to assign this contact to
033 * @param userId your application's unique identifier for this contact
034 * @param mailingLists map of mailing list IDs to subscription status (true to subscribe)
035 * @param additionalProperties custom contact properties (must match property names defined in
036 *     Loops)
037 */
038@JsonIgnoreProperties(ignoreUnknown = false)
039public record ContactCreateRequest(
040    @Nonnull String email,
041    String firstName,
042    String lastName,
043    boolean subscribed,
044    String userGroup,
045    String userId,
046    Map<String, Boolean> mailingLists,
047    Map<String, Object> additionalProperties) {}
